Mount_Vernon.Cuban Ledge:
Cuban Ledge is a reef or islet composed chiefly of sand and small rocks in Eastchester Bay, The Bronx, in Long Island Sound. It is located between Rodman's Neck and Country Club in Eastchester Bay and is visible only during periods of low tide.


== Origin and name ==
Several stories have been circulated regarding how the Cuban Ledge formed and got its name.
